benchmark.name: mpeg2
benchmark.description: A MPEG2 encoder and two versions of a MPEG2 decoder. MPEGdecoder_nomessage does not use message passing. MPEGtoBMP converts a mpeg file to a bmp file MPEGplayer plays a mpeg file, but needs screen output only available in the library version of StreamIt. BMPtoMPEG converts a few pictures to a short mpeg file.
